thread.title: Syrian army shells jihadist enclave near Damascus: pro-Assad commander

title: Syrian army shells jihadist enclave near Damascus: pro-Assad commander
text:
April 17, 2018 / 8:16 AM / Updated 19 minutes ago Syrian army shells jihadist enclave near Damascus: pro-Assad commander Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
BEIRUT (Reuters) - The Syrian army started shelling a jihadist enclave south of Damascus on Tuesday in preparation for an operation to retake the area, a commander in a pro-Damascus regional military alliance told Reuters. 
The commander, speaking on condition of anonymity, said the operation would target the Islamic State and the Nusra Front groups in Yarmouk Camp and the adjoining al-Hajar al-Aswad area. Reporting by Laila Bassam; Writing by Tom Perry; Editing by Robin Pomeroy
